1251.content: Are you shrunk by Kassandra aware or unaware?
1251.title: Assasins creed Oddessy

choices: Trapped in her sandal for not paying her
12511.title: Shrunk by Kassandra

choices: Embrace the impact of her toes crushing you
125111.content:
“How do you feel under my toes!” She said as she scrunched her dirty toes on you. “Maybe next time you’ll learn how to pay me back!” She starts stomping her sandal crushing you against her dirty foot and leaving footprints all over you. You regret thing to avoid paying her because it just brought you under her foot. Her foot dominating you in her sandal. You couldn’t do anything against it her foot was too strong and you were limited to not moving at all in her sandal.
Pic : https://images.app.goo.gl/arr5khEyeU69bZ...
125111.title: Trapped in her sandal for not paying her

choices: You’re shrunk on the road as Kassandra approaches
You shrink in the market while selling her items
12512.title: Unaware

1252.content: Which call of duty would you want?
1252.title: Call of Duty

12521.content: You are in warzone. You are so tiny and it makes it hell trying to get from zone to zone. You finally make it to one of the last circles and hide in a house. You get startled once you hear someone enter the house. The come right towards you and see you. They quickly pick you up and tie you around with tape so you couldn’t move. “What are you?” You hear the lady say. You recognize her as Mara. She was a highly trained soldier and knew how to take down her enemies. She threatens you for info but hears people approaching her. She decides it’s not safe to do it here so she’ll do it else where. She shoves you in her
12521.title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare

choices: Lick her foot passionately and clean every dirt spot
Yell no and refuse to clean her gross feet
125211.content: Her feet are very sweaty and stinky from running around the entire map. You were getting crushed by her socks inside her shoes. Her socks had really dirty footprints probably indicating that she hasn’t washed her feet in a really long time. “Why don’t you lick them why you’re down there and I might lift the punishments.”
125211.title: shoe under her sock

choices: Risk my life to avoid drinking the disgusting foot sweat
1252111.content: You submit and start to lick every spot of her sole. You start at her heel. She takes her boot off and then slides her socks and puts you back in with her barefoot. Her barefoot was extremely sweaty and as soon as she put her foot in you was already drowning I foot sweat. The only way it seems how not to drown is if you drink the foot sweat quickly but first you lick her barefoot clean. It was much more dirty than the sock and it smelled even worse. Once you got up to the toes she yelled at you to lick the toe jam too. You were forced too so you did it. The eventually you accidentally squeeze between her middle and big toe. Your head was stuck. She felt this and took advantage of it. She started scrunching her toes to feel your face in between her toes. She secretly loved every single second of dominating you with her feet. Now the sweat was really starting to drown you. Will you drink the sweat or risk drowning to not drink it?
1252111.title: Lick her foot passionately and clean every dirt...

choices: No! I can take all of this odors and torture
Yes! I can’t take anymore the aroma is unbearable!
12521111.content: You drink the sweat and fall in love even more. But drinking the sweat doesn’t stop you from passing out. Her bare foot is taking away a lot of your oxygen and everything fades to black. You wake up tied down to a table. “Finally you’re awake.” “So I want answers.” She then puts both her boots on the table, along with her socks, then rested her feet up on the table by you. “I-I don’t know anything” you manage to mutter out. “I know you have the intel, we can do this the easy way or hard way.” She then takes a boot which has sweat filling inside if it like a pool and drops you in there. “Let’s see how long you’ll last.” She then covers the top with her dirty socks and after a couple minutes slowly move her bare feet in. Will you give in?
12521111.title: Drink the delicious salty sweat

choices: You pass out in her boot.
125211111.content: “You’re lasting a lot longer than I thought...” you struggle but manage to keep yourself calm. She gets take and covers your mouth. “Let’s see you do that without being able to breath fro your mouth.” The tape made it impossible you couldn’t get any fresh oxygen. The sock made any oxygen coming from the top to get intoxicated, her foot was filling t with sweaty feet aroma faster too. Her boot was already sweaty and smelled terrible. You could tell she wore her boots barefoot most of the time. Do you give her the intel or suffer here even longer and pass out?
125211111.title: No! I can take all of this odors and torture

choices: You wake up still in the boots
You wake up tied to a table
12521112.content: You begin to start choking due to the sweat piling up. You can hear her sweat splash around with every step. “Oh well.” She says and tilts her foot in a way where you start drowning in foot sweat. You struggled as hard as you could but couldn’t breath and end up pass out.
12521112.title: Risk my life to avoid drinking the disgusting f...

choices: Allow her to dominate continue smelling feet
Try to refuse and move around
1252112.content: “Oh. Okay then. That’s fine. Perfectly fine.” She said with an angry tone in her voice. As she walked to her destination you could tell she was stomping her feet way harder than normally. She grabbed your head with her toes and held it here forcing him to take once of his biggest sniffs ever.
1252112.title: Yell no and refuse to clean her gross feet

choices: Call of duty Black Ops 2 Zombies
